footer.about: Your trusted partner for exploring the divine beauty of Uttarakhand. Safe, comfortable, and memorable journeys guaranteed.

places.name: Kedarnath
places.description: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva, located amidst the majestic Garhwal Himalayas. A spiritual journey like no other.
places.bestTime: May to June, September to October

places.name: Badrinath
places.description: A holy town dedicated to Lord Vishnu, nestled between the Nar and Narayan mountain ranges. Part of the Char Dham Yatra.
places.bestTime: May to June, September to October

places.name: Mussoorie
places.description: Known as the 'Queen of Hills', this hill station offers stunning views of the Doon Valley and the Shivalik ranges.
places.bestTime: March to June, September to November

places.name: Nainital
places.description: Famous for its Naini Lake, this charming hill station is perfect for boating, shopping, and enjoying the cool mountain air.
places.bestTime: March to June, September to November

places.name: Rishikesh
places.description: The Yoga Capital of the World, where the Ganges flows. Perfect for spirituality, yoga, and adventure sports like rafting.
places.bestTime: September to November, March to May

places.name: Haridwar
places.description: One of the seven holiest places in India, where the Ganges enters the plains. Famous for the evening Ganga Aarti.

places.name: Auli
places.description: India's premier skiing destination, offering panoramic views of Nanda Devi and other Himalayan peaks.
places.bestTime: January to March (for skiing), April to June

places.name: Jim Corbett
places.description: India's oldest national park, famous for its Bengal tigers and diverse wildlife. A paradise for nature lovers.
